Name: Genevieve "Ombra" Soberano
Details: Genevieve "Ombra" Soberano is a MechWarrior serving in the military of the Free Worlds League. Early in her career, she took part in a daring operation that stole an experimental 'Mech fitted with advanced ECM gear from the Capellan Confederation. This brought her promotion to senior command, where she has since demonstrated her skills in tactics and leadership. Despite hailing from the Duchy of Andurien, a hotbed of separatist sentiment, she is loyal to the League as a whole.
